text: Mariyu prajalalo kondaru (tama nalukalato): "Memu allah nu visvasincamu." Ani ane vyaktulunnaru. Kani varu allah marganlo hinsincapadinappudu, manavulu pettina pariksalanu allah yokka siksaga bhavistaru; mariyu okavela ni prabhuvu nundi sahayam vaste varu (kapata visvasulu) antaru: "Niscayanga, memu mitone unnamu. Sarvalokala vari hrdayala sthiti allah ku teliyada emiti
